column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Ambience: first of all
column2: the vibes are fabulous. There's a speakeasy feel
column3: especially as you're led through the main dining room
column5: into a below ground room. The lights are dimmed
column7: drinks are flowing at both bars
column8: and everyone is having a great time. It's a romantic setting but can also just be a great night out with friends. We sat in a rounded booth with a beautiful wooden table. No white tablecloths
